actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on International Economic Policy and Trade.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on International Economic Policy and Trade

official_title: To amend the Export Administration Act of 1979 to prohibit the export of unprocessed logs harvested from lands west of the 100th meridian.
short_title: Timber Fair Trade and Forest Conservation Act of 1990

summary.text: Timber Fair Trade and Forest Conservation Act of 1990 - Amends the Export Administration Act of 1979 to prohibit the sale for export, with specified exceptions, of unprocessed timber from private lands west of the 100th meridian.

titles.title: Timber Fair Trade and Forest Conservation Act of 1990
To amend the Export Administration Act of 1979 to prohibit the export of unprocessed logs harvested from lands west of the 100th meridian.
